data.title: 500 Years After Leonardo Da Vinci's Death, France Celebrates His Life And Work
data.meta_description: A new exhibition at the Louvre includes Leonardo's sketches, drawings and 11 paintings. "You can really get into his brain and try to see how he thought," says biographer Serge Bramly.
data.text:
